titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 93) setting forth the congressional budget for fiscal years 1988, 1989, and 1990 and against the consideration of such conference report.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-170.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 245 - 179 (Record Vote No: 202).

bill.summary: 6/18/1987--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H. Con. Res. 93 (congressional budget).
